channel.title: Scribbles on Retold
channel.description: Recent content in Scribbles on Retold

item.title: Gaps
item.description: While jogging early in the morning, I noticed an ambulance passing by. It caught my attention because it was quiet. When trying to follow it, it disappeared. Then I realized it was running behind some bushes. So, I talked to myself: look, you only see the gap when there is an interruption. Then, I came to a joint. So, wait, an interruption is not necessarily bad. It could also be an open opportunity.
